title: A true copie of a letter of speciall consequence from Rotetrdam [sic] in Holland subscribed by severall credible hands; and sent to a citizen of good note in London; being very considerable to be taken notice of by all the well-affected throughout the whole kingdom; but especially by the Citie of London.
publicationDate: MDCXLII. the 20. day of the second moneth. [1642, i.e. 1643]
publisher: Imprinted for Henry Overton, and are to be sold at his shoppe in Popes-head Alley,
